parameters.name: cutoff
parameters.description: The cutoff frequency, as a percentage from the maximum dimension of the input image

parameters.name: type
parameters.description: The type of filter to be used for filtering the input image

parameters.name: order
parameters.description: Describes the smoothness of the generated filter; lower values mean smoother filter

Blur (Frequency Domain).description: Blurs an image using the FFT

parameters.name: cutoff
parameters.description: The cutoff frequency, as a percentage from the maximum dimension of the input image

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: Value used for avoiding the reduction of the DC term to 0

parameters.name: multiplier
parameters.description: Value used for emphasizing edges

parameters.name: type
parameters.description: The type of filter to be used for filtering the input image

parameters.name: order
parameters.description: Describes the smoothness of the generated filter; lower values mean smoother filter

Sharpen (Frequency Domain).description: Sharpens an image using the FFT

parameters.name: charset
parameters.description: The set of characters to be used when rendering the ASCII image

parameters.name: axis
parameters.description: The axis along which to flip the image

parameters.name: axis/location
parameters.description: The axis along which to flip the image and the location(s) relative to the input image where the flipped image should be pasted

parameters.name: spectrum
parameters.description: The spectrum in which the channels will be represented

parameters.name: channel(s)
parameters.description: The channel(s) to be removed from the image

parameters.name: criterion
parameters.description: The criterion to shuffle the image data by

parameters.name: technique
parameters.description: The technique used when building the photomosaic

parameters.name: transparency
parameters.description: The level of transparency of the mosaic image

parameters.name: resolution
parameters.description: The size of the tiles used when building the mosaic

parameters.name: redundancy
parameters.description: Whether or not to allow the same tile to be repeated for neighbours

parameters.name: fidelity
parameters.description: How close the resulting image will look compared to the original (inverse proportional to the size of the composing pixels)

parameters.name: transparency
parameters.description: The degree of transparency of the watermark image when overlayed on the host image

parameters.name: location
parameters.description: The location of the watermark image

parameters.name: size
parameters.description: The maximum width of the watermark image, as a percentage of the width of the host image
